feature.name: Disciple of Life
feature.shortDescription: Your healing spells are more effective. Whenever you cast a spell of 1st level or higher to restore hit points to a creature, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

action.name: Preserve Life
action.shortDescription: As an action, you can evoke healing energy to restore 5*Cleric Level hit points. Choose any creatures within 30 feet of you, and divide the hit points among them. This feature can can a creature to no more than half of its hit point maximum. You can't use this feature on an undead or a construct.

feature.name: Blessed Healer
feature.shortDescription: The healing spells you cast on others heal you as well. When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher that restores hit points to a creature other than you, you regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

feature.name: Divine Strike
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. One on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage to the target.

feature.name: Divine Strike
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. One on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 2d8 radiant damage to the target.

feature.name: Supreme Healing
feature.shortDescription: Your healing spells are maximized. When you would normally roll one or more dice to restore hit points with a spell, you instead use the highest number of possible for each die.
